name: Math.sqrt
content:
[description]

[short_description]

Takes the square root of x.

[/short_description]

There are some math calculations that require you to take the square root. *Math.sqrt(x)* does not change the value of x, rather it returns the the square root of x or in other words the result of taking x the power of (1/2).

[/description]

examples.name: Pythagorean Theorem
examples.description: Input the lengths of sides a and b and hit "Calculate" to find the the hypotenuse of that right triangle. This example also uses [Math.pow](/docs/applab/mathPow) and [Math.round](/docs/applab/mathRound) to display results.

palette_params.name: x
palette_params.description: A number to take the square root of

return_value: A number that is the square root of x
short_description: Takes the square root of x.
